scripts.del: rm -rf build && rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy
scripts.build: npm run copy-common && npm run del && npm run compile && npm run zip
scripts.copy-common: rm -rf common && mkdir common && cd ../.. && copyfiles common/*/* rest_api/sources/post/ --soft && copyfiles common/* rest_api/sources/post/ --soft
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build && aws s3 cp deploy/lambda.zip s3://buildme-repo/sources/post.zip --profile weberlo-prod
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && aws s3 cp deploy/lambda.zip s3://buildme-repo-dev/sources/post.zip --profile weberlo-dev
